101.comments: This course is restricted to students in the Cellular Bioengineering or Biomaterials and Biomechanics streams in Biomedical Engineering. Students not part of one of these streams will be dropped without notification. Contact undergrad@bme.ubc.ca with any questions.

WL1.comments: Non-BMEG students interested in registering must contact the course instructor for permission to register in the waitlist.

description: Biomaterials science/engineering applied to design and synthesis of drug delivery systems. Biomaterial types, synthesis and testing; the use of biomaterials; biological response; biocompatibility and degradation; drug delivery systems; nanocarriers; modification of polymers; liposomes and micelles; nucleic acid, transdermal and oral delivery.
